kamal.recombination package¶

Submodules¶

kamal.recombination.combine module¶

kamal.recombination.combine.bn_combine_fn(layers)¶

Combine 2D Batch Normalization Layers

Parameters:

  • layers (BatchNorm2D): Batch Normalization Layers.

kamal.recombination.combine.combine_models(models, combine_parser)¶

Combine modules with parser

Parameters:

  • models (nn.Module): modules to be combined.

  • combine_parser (function): layer selector

kamal.recombination.combine.conv2d_combine_fn(layers)¶

Combine 2D Conv Layers

Parameters:

  • layers (Conv2d): Conv Layers.

kamal.recombination.prune module¶

kamal.recombination.prune.prune_bn_layer(layer, idxs)¶

Prune batch normalization layers

Parameters:

  • layer (BatchNorm2d): BN layer.

  • idxs (list or tuple): index of pruned weights.

kamal.recombination.prune.prune_conv_layer(layer, idxs)¶

Prune conv2d layer

Parameters:

  • layer (BatchNorm2d): conv layer.

  • idxs (list or tuple): index of pruned weights.

kamal.recombination.prune.prune_related_conv_layer(layer, idxs)¶

Prune the influenced conv2d layer

Parameters:

  • layer (BatchNorm2d): conv layer.

  • idxs (list or tuple): index of pruned weights.

kamal.recombination.recombination module¶

class kamal.recombination.recombination.Recombination(student, teachers)¶

Bases: kamal.core.multi_task.MultiTask

Recombination algorithm for knowledge amalgamation

Parameters:

  • student (nn.Module): target model.

  • teachers (nn.Module): source models.

train on datatsets
